about_the_game:
This is a Demo of the upcoming game "GearGrit"

The early 2000s are considered retro now... Feel old yet? Whether you're familiar with the inspirations behind this game, experience a game that feels like it was developed in a time capsule! Experience a semi open world with collectables, vehicles, weapons, and a living city to cause chaos in!

This demo of GearGrit is about 45 minutes long in content length, and is re-playable via our missing Time-Keeping system which updates your best time on each mission!
